turns.content:
Act as the prompt generator and I will give you the main keywords by: Product, Features, Benefits, Purpose , Target Audience, Differences , Unique, Memorable , Brand, Company, Guideline, Logo Design, Style and detail. I want you generate the automate formular prompts+keywords+keyword seeds (give me examples as much as you can) in each steps for whole process for UI process by the steps following below and write them into the markdown table
Product Characteristics
(what is your product?)

Description
(what is your product description ?)

Product Name
(What is your product name?)

Brand Name
(What is your product name?)

Logo Guideline
(Do you want a guideline for Logo?)
if No: go to next page
if Yes: Choose style LOGO
(Pick some logos you like:examples)

Cl Guideline
if No: go to next page
if yes: Choose Cl style
(Pick some banner you like:examples)

Banner Guideline
(Do you want a guideline for banner?)
if No: go to next page
if yes: Choose Banner
(Pick some banner you like:examples)

Create website
(Do you want to create a website?)
if No: go to next page
if yes: Choose Domain name
(Do you want to create a Domain name?:examples)

Web hosting
(Do you have a web hosting?)

Type of website
(Choose your website type.)

Choose CMS platform
(Choose a CMS platform)

Website guideline
(Do you want a guideline for website theme?)
if No: go to next page
if yes: Choose website them
(Pick some website theme you like)

Language
(What language do you want to output?)

Amount of words
(Choose by: 500-word, 1,000-word, 1,500-word)

Tone of voice
 (Choose tone of voice)

Writing style
(Choose writing of style)

Audience
(Choose Audience)

Here's a markdown table with the automated formular prompts for the UI process:

| Step | Prompt | Keywords | Keyword Seeds |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Product Characteristics | What is your product? | Product | Software, App, Service, Gadget |
| Description | What is your product description? | Description | Overview, Explanation, Summary |
| Product Name | What is your product name? | Product Name | Label, Title, Naming |
| Brand Name | What is your brand name? | Brand Name | Identity, Image, Reputation |
| Logo Guideline | Do you want a guideline for logo? | Logo, Guideline | Symbol, Icon, Mark |
| - | Choose style for logo | Logo, Style | Modern, Classic, Minimalistic |
| - | Pick some logos you like (examples) | Logo, Examples | Inspiration, Preferences, Samples |
| Cl Guideline | Do you want a guideline for Cl? | Cl, Guideline | Layout, Color, Typography |
| - | Choose Cl style | Cl, Style | Bold, Simple, Eye-catching |
| - | Pick some Cl banners you like (examples) | Cl, Examples | Inspiration, Preferences, Samples |
| Banner Guideline | Do you want a guideline for banner? | Banner, Guideline | Size, Shape, Content |
| - | Choose banner style | Banner, Style | Dynamic, Static, Animated |
| - | Pick some banners you like (examples) | Banner, Examples | Inspiration, Preferences, Samples |
| Create Website | Do you want to create a website? | Website, Create | Online, Presence, Platform |
| - | Choose domain name | Domain, Name | Unique, Memorable, Short |
| Web hosting | Do you have a web hosting? | Web hosting | Space, Bandwidth, Server |
| Type of website | Choose your website type | Website, Type | Blog, Portfolio, E-commerce |
| Choose CMS platform | Choose a CMS platform | CMS, Platform | WordPress, Shopify, Wix |
| Website Guideline | Do you want a guideline for website theme? | Website, Guideline, Theme | Look, Feel, Design |
| - | Choose website theme | Website, Theme | Sleek, Professional, User-friendly |
| Language | What language do you want to output? | Language | English, Spanish, French |
| Amount of words | Choose by: 500-word, 1,000-word, 1,500-word | Amount, Words | Length, Content, Volume |
| Tone of voice | Choose tone of voice | Tone, Voice | Friendly, Serious, Humorous |
| Writing style | Choose writing style | Writing, Style | Formal, Casual, Conversational |
| Audience | Choose audience | Audience | Customers, Users, Prospects |
Generate the prompt formula in each steps+long-tail keyword + keyword and also show me examples

Here's a markdown table with the automated formular prompts and long-tail keywords for the UI process:

| Step | Prompt | Keywords | Long-Tail Keywords | Examples |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Product Characteristics | What is your product? | Product | Software, App, Service, Gadget | Email client, Fitness tracker, Ride-hailing app |
| Description | What is your product description? | Description | Overview, Explanation, Summary | A brief explanation of the features and benefits of a new smartphone |
| Product Name | What is your product name? | Product Name | Label, Title, Naming | PixelPhone, FitBit, Uber |
| Brand Name | What is your brand name? | Brand Name | Identity, Image, Reputation | Google, Nike, Coca-Cola |
| Logo Guideline | Do you want a guideline for logo? | Logo, Guideline | Symbol, Icon, Mark | A set of rules and guidelines for creating a consistent and recognizable logo |
| - | Choose style for logo | Logo, Style | Modern, Classic, Minimalistic | A sleek and modern logo design with a minimalist color palette |
| - | Pick some logos you like (examples) | Logo, Examples | Inspiration, Preferences, Samples | The logos of tech companies like Apple and Tesla |
| Cl Guideline | Do you want a guideline for Cl? | Cl, Guideline | Layout, Color, Typography | A set of rules and guidelines for creating a consistent and recognizable Cl |
| - | Choose Cl style | Cl, Style | Bold, Simple, Eye-catching | A bold and eye-catching Cl design with a simple color palette |
| - | Pick some Cl banners you like (examples) | Cl, Examples | Inspiration, Preferences, Samples | The Cl banners of sports brands like Adidas and Under Armour |
| Banner Guideline | Do you want a guideline for banner? | Banner, Guideline | Size, Shape, Content | A set of rules and guidelines for creating a consistent and effective banner |
| - | Choose banner style | Banner, Style | Dynamic, Static, Animated | A dynamic and animated banner design with a modern look and feel |
| - | Pick some banners you like (examples) | Banner, Examples | Inspiration, Preferences, Samples | The banners of e-commerce websites like Amazon and eBay |
| Create Website | Do you want to create a website? | Website, Create | Online, Presence, Platform | A platform for showcasing your brand and products online |
| - | Choose domain name | Domain, Name | Unique, Memorable, Short | A short and memorable domain name that is easy to remember and type |
| Web hosting | Do you have a web hosting? | Web hosting | Space, Bandwidth, Server | A service that provides the space and resources needed to host your website |
| Type of website | Choose your website type | Website, Type | Blog, Portfolio, E-commerce | A website that showcases your portfolio and work as a creative professional |
| Choose CMS platform | Choose a CMS platform | CMS, Platform | WordPress, Shopify, Wix | A platform that makes it easy to manage and update your website content |
| Website Guideline | Do you want a guideline for website theme? | Website, Guideline, Theme | Look, Feel, Design | A set of rules and guidelines for creating a consistent and effective website theme |
| - | Choose website theme | Website, Theme | Sleek, Professional, User-friendly | A sleek and professional website theme with a user |

-friendly design and navigation |
|Language | What language do you want to output? | Language | English, Spanish, French | The language in which the website, logo, Cl, and banner will be presented |
|Amount of words | Choose by: 500-word, 1,000-word, 1,500-word | Amount, Words | Length, Content, Volume | The total number of words in the description, content, or copy for the website, logo, Cl, or banner |
|Tone of voice | Choose tone of voice | Tone, Voice | Friendly, Serious, Humorous | The tone or attitude conveyed in the language and content of the website, logo, Cl, or banner |
|Writing style | Choose writing style | Writing, Style | Formal, Casual, Conversational | The style or tone of the language and content of the website, logo, Cl, or banner |
|Audience | Choose audience | Audience | Customers, Users, Prospects | The target group of people for whom the website, logo, Cl, or banner is intended |
